responses: 3: No successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
4: Only two successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
96: Other, please specify in the comments section

question: What restrictions are in place regarding the number of terms members of the upper chamber may serve?
